CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(OR( MOD( YEAR( TODAY() ), 400 ) = 0, AND( MOD( YEAR( TODAY() ), 4 ) = 0, MOD( YEAR( TODAY() ), 100 ) != 0 ) )), MONTH(Anniversary__pc ) = 2 && DAY (Anniversary__pc ) = 29 ), OR( AND (DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) ) - TODAY() < 56, DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) ) - TODAY() >= 0 ), AND( DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) ) - TODAY() < -308, DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc +1) ) ) - TODAY() < 0) ), OR( AND (DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc ) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc ) ) ) - TODAY() < 56, DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc ) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc ) ) ) - TODAY() >= 0 ), AND( DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc ) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc ) ) ) - TODAY() < -308, DATEVALUE( TEXT( YEAR ( TODAY() ) ) & "-" & TEXT( MONTH ( Anniversary__pc ) ) & "-" & TEXT( DAY ( Anniversary__pc ) ) ) - TODAY() < 0) ) )
CustomField.label: Upcoming Anniversary
